title: Freshworks stock value drop not due to top deck rejig: Girish Mathrubootham
description: Freshworks' stock decline attributed to AI impact concerns. Mathrubootham plans to release AI adoption stats later. Woodside appointed new CEO, Device42 acquired. Clear path to billion-dollar revenue. Transition details and Silicon Valley experience emphasized.
content: Freshworks founder Girish Mathrubootham attributed a recent slide in the Nasdaq-listed companyâ€™s stock price to market anxiety regarding the impact of the artificial intelligence (AI) wave, dismissing the leadership transition or acquisition announcements that the company made last week as the possible reasons.
